clauses.title: Core Services
clauses.text: This Service Level Agreement applies only to chatbot applications, logic, workflows, integrations, and infrastructure operated directly by {{company.shortName}} ("Core Services").

clauses.title: Excluded Services
clauses.text: This SLA does not apply to services, platforms, models, messaging channels, or systems not owned or controlled by {{company.shortName}}, including Third-Party Services and client-owned systems.

clauses.title: Uptime Commitment
clauses.text: {{company.shortName}} aims to provide 99.9% uptime for the Core Services measured monthly, excluding Permitted Downtime.

clauses.title: Uptime Calculation
clauses.text: Uptime is calculated as total minutes in a calendar month minus downtime minutes, divided by total minutes, multiplied by 100. Downtime applies only where Core Services are unavailable due to {{company.shortName}}-controlled infrastructure.

clauses.title: Third-Party Dependencies
clauses.text: The Services depend on third-party platforms including (without limitation) Meta/WhatsApp, AI model providers, hosting providers, and client-managed accounts.

clauses.title: No Responsibility for Third Parties
clauses.text: Availability, performance, policy enforcement, rate limits, outages, suspensions, or failures of Third-Party Services are outside {{company.shortName}}’s control and do not count as downtime or SLA breach.

clauses.title: External Systems
clauses.text: Client-owned or third-party systems, APIs, databases, or software integrated with the Services are "External Systems".

clauses.title: No Guarantees
clauses.text: {{company.shortName}} does not guarantee availability, performance, accuracy, or data integrity of External Systems. Issues arising from External Systems do not constitute downtime.

clauses.title: Data Responsibility
clauses.text: {{company.shortName}} is not responsible for data loss or corruption originating from External Systems unless directly and solely caused by {{company.shortName}}’s Core Services.

clauses.title: Excluded Downtime
clauses.text: Permitted Downtime includes scheduled maintenance, emergency security work, third-party outages, External System failures, client misconfiguration, unauthorised changes, rate limiting, platform enforcement, force majeure events, or Client-caused issues.

clauses.title: Maintenance Notice
clauses.text: Where reasonably practicable, {{company.shortName}} will give at least 48 hours’ notice of planned maintenance and schedule it outside normal UK business hours.

clauses.title: Support Scope
clauses.text: Support covers availability issues and errors in Core Services, and reasonable assistance diagnosing third-party or External System issues.

clauses.title: Support Exclusions
clauses.text: Support excludes feature development, major functional changes, and maintenance of External Systems.

clauses.title: Hours
clauses.text: Support hours are Monday to Friday, 09:00–17:00 UK time, excluding public holidays in England and Wales.

clauses.title: Initial Response
clauses.text: {{company.shortName}} will aim to provide an initial response within 8 business hours during support hours. Initial response means acknowledgement and assessment, not resolution.

clauses.title: Third-Party Accounts
clauses.text: The Client must maintain valid third-party accounts required for the Services.

clauses.title: External Systems
clauses.text: The Client must ensure External Systems are properly maintained and notify {{company.shortName}} of changes that may affect the Services.

clauses.title: Exclusive Remedy
clauses.text: Where service credits are expressly agreed in writing, they are the Client’s sole and exclusive remedy for failure to meet uptime commitments. No service credits apply unless explicitly stated in an Order Form.

clauses.title: Security
clauses.text: {{company.shortName}} implements reasonable technical and organisational measures for systems under its control.

clauses.title: Third-Party Security
clauses.text: {{company.shortName}} is not responsible for security incidents originating from Third-Party Services or External Systems.

clauses.title: Excluded Services
clauses.text: This SLA does not apply to beta, experimental, trial, or free services, or to issues caused by misuse or unsupported configurations.

clauses.title: Alignment with Terms
clauses.text: This SLA is subject to the limitations, exclusions, and remedies set out in the main Terms. Nothing in this SLA increases {{company.shortName}}’s liability beyond what is stated in the Terms.
